Description: Topic selection, functionality definition, and team role assignment.
As a Parent, I want to register and login securely (Password Hashing, CSRF).
As an Admin, I want to manage users securely with Role-Based Access Control.
As a Parent, I want to view my dashboard and add/remove child profiles.
As a Tutor, I want to mark student attendance and view history.
As a developer, I want a robust database design with validation logic.
As a Parent, I want to book activities with conflict/capacity checks.
As a Parent, I want to join a waitlist if a class is full.
As a User, I want to receive booking confirmations and .ics calendar invites.
As a Parent, I want to download professional PDF invoices for my records.
Compiling technical documentation, diagrams, and final report.
